info.name: Reddit for mobile - read only - responsive design
info.description: Improve the appearance of Reddit on Firefox for Android. For those who don't log in and just want a quick, responsive interface without the heavy weight of Reddit's "mobile" interface.
info.additionalInfo:
To use:
 * Make sure you're browsing the "desktop" site (on mobile, click the menu at the top right and click the desktop mode button).
 * Don't plan to log in. This script hides a lot of the cruft that only applies to logged in users. Browsing only!
 * I recommend blocking subreddit custom CSS because it may interfere with the script. You can do that with ublock with the following custom filter:

||b.thumbs.redditmedia.com$stylesheet,domain=www.reddit.com
